card.name: Azorius Share-land
card.text: ~ enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you.\n{T}: Add W or U to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Dimir Share-land
card.text: ~ enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you.\n{T}: Add U or B to target player's mana pool.

card.text: ~ enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you.\n{T}: Add B or R to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Chromatic Spring
card.text: ~ enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap on your next untap step.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Chroma Processing WIP
card.text: Lands you control enter the battlefield tapped and have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Circle of Protection: Tribal
card.text: When ~ enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{2}: The next time a creature of the chosen type would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
